text.div:
Narrativa gerada: Observation InflammatoryPanelExample

status: Final

category: Laboratory

code: Lifestyle Medicine Inflammatory Panel

subject: Patient Example Unknown, DoB: 1970-01-01 ( http://example.org/patients#example-patient)

effective: 2025-11-27 08:00:00+0000

note:

Baseline inflammatory panel for lifestyle medicine program enrollment. Combines LOINC cytokines panel (82335-1) with CRP per AHA/CDC guidelines. Results will be correlated with wearable HRV data for personalized intervention planning based on RS1 systematic review findings on HRV-inflammation inverse correlation.

hasMember:

  • CRP measurement
  • IL-6 measurement
  • TNF-α measurement
